Package eg.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Help
    Opens the Help file in the default browser upon creating an object of this class
    IconFiles
    Static ImageIcons for buttons etc.
    InfoWin
    A frame that shows info about Eadgyth
    MainWin
    The main window with a split view to which areas components can be added
    Menu
    The main menu
    TabbedPane
    Defines a JTabbedPane with a button in the tabs.
    Toolbar
    The main toolbar with methods to add action listeners to the buttons
    ViewSettings
    Methods to respond to action events that change the display of the main window
